BRlist 0.0.0.9000
  • Referência

    BRlist

    Brazilian Red List of Species

    This package contains datasets from the official Brazilian Endangered Species List published by the Ministério do Meio Ambiente MMA 148/2022. The package provides separated datasets for Plants, Invertebrates (Land and Aquatic), Amphibians, Reptiles, Birds, Fishes and Mammals.
